title: My shop
body: I'm aware that My Shop didnt work properly the first time around and that Rito was doing a reset, but My Shop has been the same for the past 3 days and filled with skins for champs I never play. Is Rito still fixing this?

replies.body: Your Shop wasn't loading for certain people at all, so we did a reset in order to make sure everyone could see their sales. That's already been done, and those skins won't be changing once you've open the shop. It sucks you aren't happy with the sales you have, but there is still an element of randomness involved with what skins you see.

Oh I thought it was gonna be a complete reset for everyone, i shouldnt have opened lol. Thank you for the reply, and ya it sucks but its not like yall have to do these super sales, thanks for the opportunity to get even cheaper skins. And if yall ever doing sales again, or your shop, just an FYI  I plan on buying thresh tomorrow and maining him. Wink Wink cough cough
Heeeeey I'll do my best to pass that along hehehe ;)
